content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (1, 1)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (1, 1)) with 19 copper plates in output inventory and 16 coal in fuel inventory.

### Wooden chests
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position (3.5, 1.5)) containing 20 iron plates.
- Wooden chest (position (3.5, 3.5)) containing 50 iron plates.
- Wooden chest (position (3.5, 5.5)) empty.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting automation-science-pack
- Ensure that you have enough copper plates in your inventory or that they can be produced in a furnace before attempting to craft automation-science-pack. Currently, you cannot craft it because the required copper plates are not available.

### Errors when inserting items into a furnace
- Ensure that the furnace does not already contain items of a different type before trying to insert new items. You received errors when attempting to insert copper ore into a furnace that already contained iron ore.

### Errors related to inventory full
- Monitor your inventory space before attempting to insert items into any entity. You encountered an error when trying to insert copper ore into a furnace because your inventory was full. Make sure to manage your inventory effectively to avoid this issue.
